attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
now brussels has the final say
westminster is now redundant. the jobs
of the so called honarable gentalemen
are gone. last man out please turn off the lights. Ron Dyer.

rejection.details:
This is similar to an exisiting petition at:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
